modName: Females of the Dark Brotherhood and a Preset
summary: This mod changes the female faces of the Dark Brotherhood
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]What is this mod?[/size]

                                         Face replacer for Astrid, Gabriella and Babette.  I also included a preset of a character during my play-through in the Dark
                                  Brotherhood quest lines

[size=5]Requirements:[/size]
                              
                                        *Body Mod of your choosing
                                        *High Quality skin textures for that body

[left]                                       -Recommendation-

[b][color=#00ff00][size=3]                                [/size][/color][/b][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41304]SIZE DOES MATTER[/url] [/size]by [b]Mahlzeit88 [/b][b][color=#00ff00](To prevent custom child NPC's from rescaling)

[/color][/b][b][color=#00ff00]                                       [/color]-Preset Requirements-

                                       *[/b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624]RaceMenu[/url][/size] by [b]Expired
[/b][b]                                       *[/b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url][/size] by [b]Apachii
[/b][b]                                       *[/b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url][/size] by [b]Gabriel Mailhot
[/b][b]                                       *[/b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22701]Seductive Lips HD[/url][/size] by [b]EcthelionOtW
[/b][b]                                       *[/b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url][/size] by [b]Hello Santa


[/b][size=5]Installation and load order:

[/size][b]                                       [/b]I highly recommend using a mod manager to keep everything organized and stable[b]
[/b][b]                                      [/b] *Manual Installation (NOT RECOMMENDED) - Once the requirements are installed.  Download and extract the archive with [url=http://www.7-zip.org/]7-zip[/url] or                                        a similar program. Place the contents in the Skyrim's 'Data' folder.
[b]                                       [/b]*To Un-install - Delete placed contents
[b]                                       [/b]*Load Order - (from top) 1. Body mod  2. Skin Texture mod  3. This mod

[b][color=#cc0000][size=4]Important:[/size][/color]
[/b]                            [color=#cc0000][size=4]To prevent "NPC naked Bug", do this:[/size][/color]
[b]                [/b][b][size=2][color=#cc0000] [/color]        [/size][/b][size=4]After installation, you need to make a new saved game.  [u]The Player need to be outside the"Sanctuary"[/u][u] when saving[/u].[/size]  [size=4]Exit/quit, then close the game.  [/size][size=4]Reload your saved game.  Wait 24 hour in-game time.  Enter the "Sanctuary" and happy gaming[/size]

[b]
[/b][size=5]Credits:[/size][b]           
       [/b][b]              [/b][b]             
                                     [/b][b]*[/b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] [/size][size=2]by Apachii
[/size][b]                                     *[/b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url][/size] by [b]Gabriel Mailhot[/b][/left][left][b]                                     [/b]*[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url][/size] by [b]dimon99
                                     [/b][b]*[/b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22701]Seductive Lips HD[/url][/size] by [b]EcthelionOtW
[/b][b]                                     [/b][b]*[/b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url][/size] by [b]Hello Santa
[/b][b]                                     [/b]*[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdos[/url][/size] by [b]Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky
[/b][b]                                     [/b]*[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624]RaceMenu[/url][/size] by [b]Expired[/b][b]
[/b][/left]
author: hyde606
